sentences.en: New findings suggest that Gage managed to soften these abrupt changes over time and rediscover an appropriate social manner.
sentences.cn: 新的发现表明，随着时间的推移，Gage 设法缓和了这些突然的变化，并重新发现了一种适当的社交方式。

sentences.en: Angels fascinate, as Christmas-card-makers rediscover every year.
sentences.cn: 天使令人着迷，正如圣诞卡制造商们每年一再发现的那样。

sentences.en: Would it not worthwhile to rediscover?
sentences.cn: 难道这不值得去重新发现吗？
